has-id.dialog:
IntroDialogCredits bootcampMessage
ORANGE ../maps/icons/bootcamp/lines/bcCredits.png #bootcamp:message/credits/label #bootcamp:message/credits/text SubtitleTankImprovement bc_info_line_universal rewards
../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/bcCredits.png {0} getCredits #tooltips:credits/header ../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/tooltips/bcCredits.png #bootcamp:message/credits/text lobby:header.headerButtonBar.container.id=credits.container.0.moneyIconText.iconClip credits

IntroDialogExp bootcampMessage
ORANGE ../maps/icons/bootcamp/lines/bcExp.png #bootcamp:message/experience/label #bootcamp:message/experience/text SubtitleExperience bc_info_line_universal rewards
../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/bcExp.png {0} getExperience #tooltips:XP/header ../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/tooltips/bcExp.png #bootcamp:message/experience/text hangar:vehResearchPanel.xpText.iconClip.1 experience

has-id.dialog:
EquipmentIntroDialog bootcampMessage
ORANGE ../maps/icons/bootcamp/lines/bcConsum.png #bootcamp:message/consumables/label #bootcamp:message/consumables/text SubtitleKit bc_achievements_shine rewards
../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/bclargeRepairkit.png #bootcamp:message/repair/kit/label ../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/tooltips/bcRemBig.png #artefacts:largeRepairkit/onUse #bootcamp:message/missionBonusCount getRepairKits
../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/bclargeMedkit.png #bootcamp:message/first/aid/kit/label ../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/tooltips/bcMedBig.png #artefacts:largeMedkit/onUse #bootcamp:message/missionBonusCount getFirstAid
../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/bchandExtinguishers.png #bootcamp:message/fire/extinguisher/label ../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/tooltips/bcFireEx.png #artefacts:handExtinguishers/onUse #bootcamp:message/missionBonusCount getFireExtinguisher

GoldReceivedDialog bootcampMessage
ORANGE ../maps/icons/bootcamp/lines/bcGold.png #bootcamp:message/goldReceived/label #bootcamp:message/gold/label #bootcamp:message/gold/premiumPlus/text SubtitleGold bc_info_line_universal rewards True
../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/bcGold.png #tooltips:gold/header ../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/tooltips/bcGold.png #bootcamp:message/goldReceived/label {0} getGold lobby:header.headerButtonBar.container.id=gold.container.0.moneyIconText.iconClip gold

PremiumAccountReceivedDialog bootcampMessage
ORANGE ../maps/icons/bootcamp/lines/bcPremiumPlus.png #bootcamp:message/premiumPlus/label #bootcamp:message/premiumPlusReceived/label #bootcamp:message/premiumPlus/text SubtitlePremium bc_info_line_universal rewards True
../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/bcPremiumPlus3d.png #tooltips:awardItem/premium/header ../maps/icons/bootcamp/rewards/tooltips/bcPremiumPlus3d.png #bootcamp:message/premiumPlus/text {0} getPremiumHours lobby:header.headerButtonBar.container.id=prem.container.0.premIcon prem
